org.kududb.client

Class KuduClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kududb.client.KuduClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class KuduClient
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    A synchronous and thread-safe client for Kudu.

    This class acts as a wrapper around AsyncKuduClient. The Deferred objects are joined against using the default admin operation timeout (see KuduClient.KuduClientBuilder.defaultAdminOperationTimeoutMs(long) (long)}).

    • Method Detail

      • createTable

        public KuduTable createTable(String name,
                             Schema schema)
                      throws Exception
        Create a table on the cluster with the specified name and schema. Default table configurations are used, mainly the table will have one tablet.
        Parameters:
        name - Table's name
        schema - Table's schema
        Returns:
        an object to communicate with the created table
        Throws:
        Exception

      • createTable

        public KuduTable createTable(String name,
                             Schema schema,
                             CreateTableOptions builder)
                      throws Exception
        Create a table on the cluster with the specified name, schema, and table configurations.
        Parameters:
        name - the table's name
        schema - the table's schema
        builder - a builder containing the table's configurations
        Returns:
        an object to communicate with the created table
        Throws:
        Exception

      • deleteTable

        public DeleteTableResponse deleteTable(String name)
                                throws Exception
        Delete a table on the cluster with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - the table's name
        Returns:
        an rpc response object
        Throws:
        Exception

      • alterTable

        public AlterTableResponse alterTable(String name,
                                     AlterTableOptions ato)
                              throws Exception
        Alter a table on the cluster as specified by the builder. When the method returns it only indicates that the master accepted the alter command, use isAlterTableDone(String) to know when the alter finishes.
        Parameters:
        name - the table's name, if this is a table rename then the old table name must be passed
        ato - the alter table builder
        Returns:
        an rpc response object
        Throws:
        Exception

      • isAlterTableDone

        public boolean isAlterTableDone(String name)
                         throws Exception
        Helper method that checks and waits until the completion of an alter command. It will block until the alter command is done or the timeout is reached.
        Parameters:
        name - Table's name, if the table was renamed then that name must be checked against
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the table is done being altered
        Throws:
        Exception

      • listTabletServers

        public ListTabletServersResponse listTabletServers()
                                            throws Exception
        Get the list of running tablet servers.
        Returns:
        a list of tablet servers
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getTablesList

        public ListTablesResponse getTablesList()
                                 throws Exception
        Get the list of all the tables.
        Returns:
        a list of all the tables
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getTablesList

        public ListTablesResponse getTablesList(String nameFilter)
                                 throws Exception
        Get a list of table names. Passing a null filter returns all the tables. When a filter is specified, it only returns tables that satisfy a substring match.
        Parameters:
        nameFilter - an optional table name filter
        Returns:
        a deferred that contains the list of table names
        Throws:
        Exception

      • tableExists

        public boolean tableExists(String name)
                    throws Exception
        Test if a table exists.
        Parameters:
        name - a non-null table name
        Returns:
        true if the table exists, else false
        Throws:
        Exception

      • openTable

        public KuduTable openTable(String name)
                    throws Exception
        Open the table with the given name. If the table was just created, this method will block until all its tablets have also been created.
        Parameters:
        name - table to open
        Returns:
        a KuduTable if the table exists, else a MasterErrorException
        Throws:
        Exception

      • newSession

        public KuduSession newSession()
        Create a new session for interacting with the cluster. User is responsible for destroying the session object. This is a fully local operation (no RPCs or blocking).
        Returns:
        a synchronous wrapper around KuduSession.

      • newScannerBuilder

        public KuduScanner.KuduScannerBuilder newScannerBuilder(KuduTable table)
        Creates a new KuduScanner.KuduScannerBuilder for a particular table.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table you intend to scan. The string is assumed to use the platform's default charset.
        Returns:
        a new scanner builder for this table

           throws Exception
